AssociateApprovedOrigin.description: Grants permission to associate approved origin for an existing Amazon Connect instance

AssociateCustomerProfilesDomain.name: AssociateCustomerProfilesDomain
AssociateCustomerProfilesDomain.description: Grants permission to associate a Customer Profiles domain for an existing Amazon Connect instance

AssociateDefaultVocabulary.name: AssociateDefaultVocabulary
AssociateDefaultVocabulary.description: Grants permission to default vocabulary for an existing Amazon Connect instance

AssociateFlow.name: AssociateFlow
AssociateFlow.description: Grants permission to associate a resource with a flow in an Amazon Connect instance

AssociateInstanceStorageConfig.name: AssociateInstanceStorageConfig
AssociateInstanceStorageConfig.description: Grants permission to associate instance storage for an existing Amazon Connect instance

AssociateLambdaFunction.name: AssociateLambdaFunction

CreateContactFlowModule.description: Grants permission to create a contact flow module in an Amazon Connect instance

CreateEvaluationForm.description: Grants permission to create an evaluation form in the specified Amazon Connect instance. The form can be used to define questions related to agent performance, and create sections to organize such questions. Question and section identifiers cannot be duplicated within the same evaluation form

CreateIntegrationAssociation.description: Grants permission to create an integration association with an Amazon Connect instance

CreatePrompt.description: Grants permission to create a prompt in an Amazon Connect instance

SendChatIntegrationEvent.description: Grants permission to send chat integration events using the Amazon Connect API

StartAttachedFileUpload.description: Grants permission to start an attached file upload in an Amazon Connect instance

StartChatContact.name: StartChatContact
StartChatContact.description: Grants permission to initiate a chat using the Amazon Connect API

StartContactEvaluation.name: StartContactEvaluation
StartContactEvaluation.description: Grants permission to start an empty evaluation in the specified Amazon Connect instance, using the given evaluation form for the particular contact. The evaluation form version used for the contact evaluation corresponds to the currently activated version. If no version is activated for the evaluation form, the contact evaluation cannot be started

StartContactRecording.name: StartContactRecording
StartContactRecording.description: Grants permission to start recording for the specified contact

StartContactStreaming.name: StartContactStreaming
StartContactStreaming.description: Grants permission to start chat streaming using the Amazon Connect API

StartForecastingPlanningSchedulingIntegr.name: StartForecastingPlanningSchedulingIntegration
StartForecastingPlanningSchedulingIntegr.description: Grants permission to enable forecasting, planning, and scheduling integration on an Amazon Connect instance

StartOutboundVoiceContact.name: StartOutboundVoiceContact
StartOutboundVoiceContact.description: Grants permission to initiate outbound calls using the Amazon Connect API

StartTaskContact.name: StartTaskContact
StartTaskContact.description: Grants permission to initiate a task using the Amazon Connect API

StartWebRTCContact.name: StartWebRTCContact
StartWebRTCContact.description: Grants permission to initiate a WebRTC contact using the Amazon Connect API

StopContact.name: StopContact
StopContact.description: Grants permission to stop contacts that were initiated using the Amazon Connect API. If you use this operation on an active contact the contact ends, even if the agent is active on a call with a customer

StopContactRecording.name: StopContactRecording
StopContactRecording.description: Grants permission to stop recording for the specified contact

StopContactStreaming.name: StopContactStreaming
StopContactStreaming.description: Grants permission to stop chat streaming using the Amazon Connect API

StopForecastingPlanningSchedulingIntegra.name: StopForecastingPlanningSchedulingIntegration
StopForecastingPlanningSchedulingIntegra.description: Grants permission to disable forecasting, planning, and scheduling integration on an Amazon Connect instance

SubmitContactEvaluation.name: SubmitContactEvaluation
SubmitContactEvaluation.description: Grants permission to submit a contact evaluation in the specified Amazon Connect instance. Answers included in the request are merged with existing answers for the given evaluation. If no answers or notes are passed, the evaluation is submitted with the existing answers and notes. You can delete an answer or note by passing an empty object ({}) to the question identifier

SuspendContactRecording.name: SuspendContactRecording
SuspendContactRecording.description: Grants permission to suspend recording for the specified contact

TagContact.name: TagContact
TagContact.description: Grants permission to tag a contact in an Amazon Connect instance

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag an Amazon Connect resource

TransferContact.name: TransferContact
TransferContact.description: Grants permission to transfer the contact to another queue or agent

UntagContact.name: UntagContact
UntagContact.description: Grants permission to untag a contact in an Amazon Connect instance

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag an Amazon Connect resource

UpdateAgentStatus.name: UpdateAgentStatus
UpdateAgentStatus.description: Grants permission to update agent status in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateAuthenticationProfile.name: UpdateAuthenticationProfile
UpdateAuthenticationProfile.description: Grants permission to update authentication profile resources in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateContact.name: UpdateContact
UpdateContact.description: Grants permission to update a contact in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateContactAttributes.name: UpdateContactAttributes
UpdateContactAttributes.description: Grants permission to create or update the contact attributes associated with the specified contact

UpdateContactEvaluation.name: UpdateContactEvaluation
UpdateContactEvaluation.description: Grants permission to update details about a contact evaluation in the specified Amazon Connect instance. A contact evaluation must be in the draft state. Answers included in the request are merged with existing answers for the given evaluation. An answer or note can be deleted by passing an empty object ({}) to the question identifier

UpdateContactFlowContent.name: UpdateContactFlowContent
UpdateContactFlowContent.description: Grants permission to update contact flow content in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateContactFlowMetadata.name: UpdateContactFlowMetadata
UpdateContactFlowMetadata.description: Grants permission to update the metadata of a contact flow in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateContactFlowModuleContent.name: UpdateContactFlowModuleContent
UpdateContactFlowModuleContent.description: Grants permission to update contact flow module content in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateContactFlowModuleMetadata.name: UpdateContactFlowModuleMetadata
UpdateContactFlowModuleMetadata.description: Grants permission to update the metadata of a contact flow module in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateContactFlowName.name: UpdateContactFlowName
UpdateContactFlowName.description: Grants permission to update the name and description of a contact flow in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateContactRoutingData.name: UpdateContactRoutingData
UpdateContactRoutingData.description: Grants permission to update routing properties on a contact in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateContactSchedule.name: UpdateContactSchedule
UpdateContactSchedule.description: Grants permission to update the schedule of a contact that is already scheduled in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateEvaluationForm.name: UpdateEvaluationForm
UpdateEvaluationForm.description: Grants permission to update details about a specific evaluation form version in the specified Amazon Connect instance. Question and section identifiers cannot be duplicated within the same evaluation form

UpdateHoursOfOperation.name: UpdateHoursOfOperation
UpdateHoursOfOperation.description: Grants permission to update hours of operation in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateInstanceAttribute.name: UpdateInstanceAttribute
UpdateInstanceAttribute.description: Grants permission to update the attribute for an existing Amazon Connect instance

UpdateInstanceStorageConfig.name: UpdateInstanceStorageConfig
UpdateInstanceStorageConfig.description: Grants permission to update the storage configuration for an existing Amazon Connect instance

UpdateParticipantRoleConfig.name: UpdateParticipantRoleConfig
UpdateParticipantRoleConfig.description: Grants permission to update participant role configurations associated with a contact

UpdatePhoneNumber.name: UpdatePhoneNumber
UpdatePhoneNumber.description: Grants permission to update phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance or traffic distribution group

UpdatePhoneNumberMetadata.name: UpdatePhoneNumberMetadata
UpdatePhoneNumberMetadata.description: Grants permission to update the metadata of a phone number resource in an Amazon Connect instance or traffic distribution group

UpdatePredefinedAttribute.name: UpdatePredefinedAttribute
UpdatePredefinedAttribute.description: Grants permission to update a predefined attribute in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdatePrompt.name: UpdatePrompt
UpdatePrompt.description: Grants permission to update a prompt's name, description, and Amazon S3 URI in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateQueueHoursOfOperation.name: UpdateQueueHoursOfOperation
UpdateQueueHoursOfOperation.description: Grants permission to update queue hours of operation in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateQueueMaxContacts.name: UpdateQueueMaxContacts
UpdateQueueMaxContacts.description: Grants permission to update queue capacity in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateQueueName.name: UpdateQueueName
UpdateQueueName.description: Grants permission to update a queue name and description in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateQueueOutboundCallerConfig.name: UpdateQueueOutboundCallerConfig
UpdateQueueOutboundCallerConfig.description: Grants permission to update queue outbound caller config in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateQueueStatus.name: UpdateQueueStatus
UpdateQueueStatus.description: Grants permission to update queue status in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateQuickConnectConfig.name: UpdateQuickConnectConfig
UpdateQuickConnectConfig.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of a quick connect in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateQuickConnectName.name: UpdateQuickConnectName
UpdateQuickConnectName.description: Grants permission to update a quick connect name and description in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateRoutingProfileAgentAvailabilityTim.name: UpdateRoutingProfileAgentAvailabilityTimer
UpdateRoutingProfileAgentAvailabilityTim.description: Grants permission to update a routing profile agent availability timer in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateRoutingProfileConcurrency.name: UpdateRoutingProfileConcurrency
UpdateRoutingProfileConcurrency.description: Grants permission to update the concurrency in a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateRoutingProfileDefaultOutboundQueue.name: UpdateRoutingProfileDefaultOutboundQueue
UpdateRoutingProfileDefaultOutboundQueue.description: Grants permission to update the outbound queue in a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateRoutingProfileName.name: UpdateRoutingProfileName
UpdateRoutingProfileName.description: Grants permission to update a routing profile name and description in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateRoutingProfileQueues.name: UpdateRoutingProfileQueues
UpdateRoutingProfileQueues.description: Grants permission to update the queues in routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateRule.name: UpdateRule
UpdateRule.description: Grants permission to update a rule for an existing Amazon Connect instance

UpdateSecurityProfile.name: UpdateSecurityProfile
UpdateSecurityProfile.description: Grants permission to update a security profile group for a user in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateTaskTemplate.name: UpdateTaskTemplate
UpdateTaskTemplate.description: Grants permission to update task template belonging to a Amazon Connect instance

UpdateTrafficDistribution.name: UpdateTrafficDistribution
UpdateTrafficDistribution.description: Grants permission to update traffic distribution for a traffic distribution group

UpdateUserHierarchy.name: UpdateUserHierarchy
UpdateUserHierarchy.description: Grants permission to update a hierarchy group for a user in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateUserHierarchyGroupName.name: UpdateUserHierarchyGroupName
UpdateUserHierarchyGroupName.description: Grants permission to update a user hierarchy group name in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateUserHierarchyStructure.name: UpdateUserHierarchyStructure
UpdateUserHierarchyStructure.description: Grants permission to update user hierarchy structure in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateUserIdentityInfo.name: UpdateUserIdentityInfo
UpdateUserIdentityInfo.description: Grants permission to update identity information for a user in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateUserPhoneConfig.name: UpdateUserPhoneConfig
UpdateUserPhoneConfig.description: Grants permission to update phone configuration settings for a user in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateUserProficiencies.name: UpdateUserProficiencies
UpdateUserProficiencies.description: Grants permission to update user proficiencies from a user in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateUserRoutingProfile.name: UpdateUserRoutingProfile
UpdateUserRoutingProfile.description: Grants permission to update a routing profile for a user in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateUserSecurityProfiles.name: UpdateUserSecurityProfiles
UpdateUserSecurityProfiles.description: Grants permission to update security profiles for a user in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateViewContent.name: UpdateViewContent
UpdateViewContent.description: Grants permission to update a view's content in an Amazon Connect instance

UpdateViewMetadata.name: UpdateViewMetadata
UpdateViewMetadata.description: Grants permission to update a view's metadata in an Amazon Connect instance
